snippet.title: Claritas - New Turn-Based Dungeon Crawler RPG | Build Your Party & Conquer Epic Challenges!
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3206870/Claritas__Dungeon_Crawler_RPG/
Website: https://playclaritas.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/ANbTY2F8dB

Dive into the world of Claritas, an exciting upcoming 2D, turn-based dungeon crawler RPG! Assemble a party of 4 heroes and take on progressively harder dungeons in a strategic battle for survival. With 20 unique heroes, 120 abilities, and over 300 pieces of gear, every run is a fresh challenge. Prepare your party, collect powerful loot, and face the ultimate test of your skills!

Features include:
🔥 20 Playable Heroes, each with 4 unique abilities
🛡️ 320 Pieces of Equipment to customize your heroes
🎮 10 Unique Dungeons, each with its own challenging boss
⚔️ 110 Consumable Items for tactical combat advantage

Future updates will add:
🎲 Random Event System in Dungeons
🗺️ A Quest System to enhance exploration
🆕 50+ New Dungeons, More Heroes, Abilities, and so much more!

Stay tuned for updates and wishlist Claritas now to join the adventure!

#claritas #rpg #dungeon crawler #dungeon crawler rpg #roguelite #2d rpg #turn based #strategy #rpgmaker #jrpg
